name: Venera
subtitle: Venera official AltStore Source.
description:
This is the official AltStore Source for Venera.

 A comic reader that supports reading local and network comics

apps.name: Venera
apps.subtitle: A comic reader that supports reading local and network comics
apps.versionDescription:
What's Changed
* Set status bar transparent when startup. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/664
* Jump to last page when continuously flipping to previous chapter.  by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/665
* Show chapter comments at end of chapter. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/666
* Save file name: {comic}_EP{chapter}_P{page}.{ext} to avoid conflict. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/669
* Enable to refresh history info. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/722
* Update AltStore source with latest release by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/651
* Update comic source URL to use jsdelivr CDN for improved reliability by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/734
* Improve layout of buttons in reader by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/735 

Full Changelog: https://github.com/venera-app/venera/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2
apps.localizedDescription: A comic reader that supports reading local and network comics

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Face ID or Touch ID is used to protect your privacy when opening the app, ensuring secure access to your reading content.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Used to save comic images you've favorited or downloaded to your photo library for easy access and sharing.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to select images from your photo library when needed, and to save comic images you've collected to your device.

versions.localizedDescription:
What's Changed
* Set status bar transparent when startup. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/664
* Jump to last page when continuously flipping to previous chapter.  by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/665
* Show chapter comments at end of chapter. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/666
* Save file name: {comic}_EP{chapter}_P{page}.{ext} to avoid conflict. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/669
* Enable to refresh history info. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/722
* Update AltStore source with latest release by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/651
* Update comic source URL to use jsdelivr CDN for improved reliability by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/734
* Improve layout of buttons in reader by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/735 

Full Changelog: https://github.com/venera-app/venera/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

What's Changed
* Update AltStore source with latest release by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/602
* Add encryptAes for js_engine by @liulifox233 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/645
* Optimize iOS full-screen back gesture implementation by @liulifox233 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/643
* Fix landscape reader layout and wrap long settings labels by @boa-z in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/640
* Enhance Cloudflare challenge detection logic by @Y-Ymeow in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/619
* interceptor: mask log by @Pacalini in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/618
* feat: skip sync setting by @Pacalini in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/563
* flutter 3.38.3 by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/648
* fix: enable multi-select actions in local comics search mode by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/650
* feat: add comment keyword blocking functionality by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/649 
New Contributors
* @Y-Ymeow made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/619 
Full Changelog: https://github.com/venera-app/venera/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

What's Changed
* Update AltStore source with latest release by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/559
* 调整多收藏夹漫画源的收藏状态显示逻辑 by @Ftbom in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/571
* Enhance onResponse to support Future and validate result type by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/574
* [iOS] Enable full screen swipe back gesture by @liulifox233 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/575
* [linux] Fix linux nhentai cover image by @4b1tQu4ntN3k0 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/578
* feat: 支持过滤阅读完成情况 by @luckyray-fan in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/582
* Fix chinese character issue when compressing files. Close 565 by @ynyx631 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/583
* Add support for ArrayBuffer to showInputDialog. by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/585
* Added support for localstorage when logging in via webview. by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/586
* Fix the issue of the comic list loading infinitely. Close 584 by @ynyx631 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/588
* Save data when mark all as read by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/592
* Chapter comments. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/593
* Optimize favorite page and home page. by @lings03 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/594
* Update version code by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/596
* Fix missing depends in deb package. Close 587 by @wgh136 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/597
* feat: 本地收藏搜索支持转小写匹配 by @luckyray-fan in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/598
* Fix editor page gesture confict by @liulifox233 in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/600 
New Contributors
* @github-actions[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/559
* @Ftbom made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/571
* @liulifox233 made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/575
* @4b1tQu4ntN3k0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/578
* @ynyx631 made their first contribution in https://github.com/venera-app/venera/pull/583 
Full Changelog: https://github.com/venera-app/venera/compare/v1.5.3...v1.6.0

1. Fix an issue where the app freezes after swiping back on Android. 544
2. Enable minification when building for Android. 547
3. Prevent the app from creating an archive download task when the archive URL is an empty string.

1. Fixed an abnormal single image height issue when "imagesPerPage > 1". 379  
2. Fixed an invalid page calculation issue when "showSingleImageOnFirstPage" is enabled.  
3. Fixed an issue with incorrect reading history when displaying a single image on the first page.  
4. Fixed abnormal history recording when pages are not flipped. 392  
5. Fixed an issue where the download task would stop after exiting the reader. 387  
6. Fixed a "RangeError" when translating tags. 356  
7. Reset the current folder to null on the favorites page if the folder is invalid. 389  
8. Fixed various issues when using a custom download path on Android. 400  
9. Set the initial chapter to the first downloaded chapter if no history exists when starting to read a local comic. 405  
10. Removed the config file repository URL from the app.
